cab.content: (This Document is ihe Prcpervi oi12919BATTLE SITUATION - 1TC01T - APRIL 26th, 1918.The situation in the neighbourhood of KEMMEIi HILL is still obscure * The enemy are believed to hold the Hill, but it is not)known what lino the French are holding West of thethe KEMMEL BEEK and captured 50 prisoners.There lias been increased artillery activity by Gas and High Explosive shells in the vicinity Of YPRE3.The situation on the VILLERS - BRET0K1-IEUX Plateau has been completely restored, We hold the village of VILLERS -BRET OMEUX the M0FJHE1TT:, and the BOIS de HANG-ARB* An attempt by the French to recapture the village of EA1TGARD broke down. The French are making another attempt today to recapture this village.On the rest of the front there is no change.Hill,llorth of KPEMfvEL one of our Divisions advanced acrosseral Staff,War Office, S.W*1.26th April, 1918.Issued at 12.10 pam.
